original_text: Jacob set up a special stone on the ground. It showed the place where God had spoken to him. He poured a drink offering on the stone. He also poured olive oil on it.
korean_text: 야곱이 하나님이 자기와 말씀하시던 곳에 기둥 곧 돌 기둥을 세우고 그 위에 전제물을 붓고 또 그 위에 기름을 붓고

sentences.original_text: Jacob set up a special stone on the ground
It showed the place where God had spoken to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 그에게 말씀하셨던 장소를 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: He poured a drink offering on the stone
He also poured olive oil on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 위에 올리브 기름도 부었다
